channel.title: Drinktober 2019 on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Drinktober 2019 on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Jesse James IPA
item.description: Howdy there, pardners! For the second of #Drinktober, a quick raid of Aldi’s craft beer section yielded up this cowboy-themed American Pale Ale - seemed only right to dress for the occasion
